Suntimes Apps

This is a repository of Suntimes related apps. The applications in this repository are either official binaries built by the application developer, or are binaries built from source by the admin of f-droid.org using the tools on https://gitlab.com/fdroid, and then mirrored here.

Currently it serves 6 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://forrestguice.github.io/SuntimesApps/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
94 C2 12 B7 5B CC D6 60 A2 B0 3F 7C 7D 28 53 4F C9 A3 85 69 B3 E9 8A 02 0C E0 5A E6 7E C1 99 68
